entry.title: PyRK A Python Package for Nuclear Reactor Kinetics
Keynote - Academic Open Source
entry.summary:
Description

Academia, in particular academic science, has a great deal to learn and gain from its harmony with open source. Similarly, open source communities increasingly find themselves responsible for education. This talk will touch on the past, present, and possible future of the rich, delicate symbiosis between academia and open â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Academia, in particular academic science, has a great deal to learn and gain from its harmony with open source. Similarly, open source communities increasingly find themselves responsible for education. This talk will touch on the past, present, and possible future of the rich, delicate symbiosis between academia and open source.
